name: SEL
body:
### What is SEL.
S "Skill"
E "Exchange"
L "Lunch"

We teach each other while having lunch.

### coding lessons
```
# lessons of php
$ git clone git@github.com:skillexchange/Lunch.git
$ cd your-repo/php-lesson
```

### How does lessons work
```
$ cd php-code/****.php
```
First you look and understand php-code.
Perphaps, name of phpscripts are 1stlesson,2ndlesson,3rdlesson... 


### Homework
```
$ cd php-hw/****.php
```
Every lessons have homework.
Open the php script, you start home work!!


### Authors and Contributors

@takewick is English teacher and coding student.

@summerwind 
@connvoi_tyou are conding teacher and English student.
